file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 24-61-00-05 - GROUND SERVICE BUSES - ADJUSTMENT/TEST

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL GROUND SERVICE BUSES - ADJUSTMENT/TEST EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the operational test of the Ground Service Buses. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY GROUND SERVICE BUSES - OPERA- ALL 24-61-00-700-801-A TIONAL TEST EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 24-61-00 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 24-61-00-700-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. GROUND SERVICE BUSES - OPERATIONAL TEST A. General (1) The function of this test is to make sure that the ground service bus circuit operates correctly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 33-00-00/1 ENERGIZATION OF THE AIRCRAFT WITH AN EX- AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200 TERNAL POWER SOURCE C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger Cabin I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Not applicable. J. Test Procedure SUBTASK 710-002-A (1) Do the task as follows: (a) Connect the External DC-Power Supply to the aircraft ( AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200). Result: 1 The Cabin lights, Galley lights, Lavatory lights, Compartment lights and Courtesy lights come on (AMM SDS 33-00-00/1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 24-61-00 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Disconnect the External DC-Power Supply ( AMM TASK 20-40-01-860-801-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 24-61-00 Page 3 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
